space_names.title: Octopus Spaces to Sync
space_names.description: The Octopus Spaces to sync. If no Spaces provided, all Spaces will be synced.

fetch_deployment_process.title: Fetch Deployment Process
fetch_deployment_process.description: Retrieve the deployment process for each deployment.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: The number of days of data to sync from Octopus.

look_back_depth.title: Look Back Depth
look_back_depth.description: The number of items to look back past the checkpoint when syncing incrementally.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: The page size to use when paginating Octopus resources.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: The maximum number of times to retry requests to Octopus.

reject_unauthorized.title: Reject Unauthorized
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the Octopus server.
